name: Rahul Asati
summary: Rahul Asati is the CTO and Cofounder of Atlas, focusing on building a leading customer support platform. He has extensive experience in engineering leadership and data infrastructure development across multiple companies.
work_history: Atlas (YC W22): CTO and Cofounder, January 2022 - Present, San Francisco Bay Area. California State University - East Bay: Advisor for Big Data Program, June 2021 - Present. IEEE: Senior Member, July 2021 - Present. International Digital Awards: Judge, June 2021 - Present. Glide: Director Of Engineering, October 2017 - January 2022, San Francisco Bay Area (Acquired by Compass). On Deck: Fellow, February 2020 - February 2021. Zenefits: Senior Staff Engineer, December 2013 - October 2017, San Francisco Bay Area (Acquired by Trinet). D. E. Shaw & Co.: Staff Engineer, July 2008 - December 2013, Hyderabad Area, India.
project_history: At Glide, led the creation of a real estate marketplace, developed infrastructure for online form filling, and led a data team to build a data warehouse. At Zenefits, co-led the HR engineering team and led support engineering to reduce support costs by 40%. At D. E. Shaw & Co., developed heuristics algorithms, created dashboards for securities analysis, and built the company's first data warehouse.
education: Indian Institute of Technology (Banaras Hindu University), Varanasi: B.Tech, Computer Science, 2004 - 2008. Y Combinator, January 2022 - March 2022.
